com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.device.connection

Interface PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteConnectionListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PowerMoteConnection

    public static interface PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteConnectionListener
    PowerMoteConnectionListener provides callbacks indicating whether connection state changed.
    See Also:
    PowerMoteConnection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnect()
      Callback invoked when Android device established connection with PowerMote.
      void onDisconnect()
      Callback invoked when Android device is disconnected from PowerMote.
      void onError(PowerMoteError error)
      Callback invoked when unexpected error occurred during interacting with PowerMote.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect()
        Callback invoked when Android device established connection with PowerMote.

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect()
        Callback invoked when Android device is disconnected from PowerMote.

      • onError

        void onError(PowerMoteError error)
        Callback invoked when unexpected error occurred during interacting with PowerMote.
        Parameters:
        error - Connecting error. Can be one of ERROR_BLUETOOTH_NOT_FOUND, ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_PROVIDED, ERROR_NO_LOOPER_IN_THREAD, ERROR_CONNECTION_FAILED, ERROR_CONNECTION_SCAN_FAILED.
        See Also:
        PowerMoteError
